name: iSpyFireSmartStation
0:
”Alexa, turn on ispyfire”
”Alexa, turn off ispyfire”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
You will need a Station Automation Account with iSpyFire to utilize this skill!!

Creates and Alexa Smart Home Doorbell Device that iSpyFire will trigger based on notification rules in iSpyFire. This will allow you to create routines that can be triggered by the virtual iSpyFire device(s) that are tied to notification groups. You can then automate how your station or home will react when iSpyFire attempts to notify you of different things.

You can toggle the triggering of these devices by turning them off or on by using your voice. If off, notifications will not trigger the device. If on, notifications will trigger the device.

You configure which notifications trigger which virtual device from inside the iSpyFire Web Application.
